timeline.message:
Remove Tomcat templates

- Remove CustomWebapploader
- Remove tomcat download from Makefile
- Remove `pxf-service/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/web.xml`
- Remove `pxf-service/src/main/webapp/META-INF/context.xml`

timeline.bodyText: are we still gonna use catalina.sh ?
timeline.author: denalex
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -137,7 +137,7 @@ function createInstance()
 
     # copy configuration files into instance
     cp "$tomcat_templates"/bin/{kill-pxf,setenv,catalina}.sh "${instance}/bin"

replies.bodyText: there are also references to tomcat elsewhere in this script (line 131)
replies.author: denalex

replies.bodyText: I think we were planning to reuse catalina.sh but we need to modify. There are some stories that address all scripts
replies.author: frankgh
